name: il_large_count_saturates_from_cursor
description: IL with count larger than remaining region span saturates from cursor to region bottom
comment: Fill rows 0..4 with A..E at col 0. Set DECSTBM(2,4) -> region rows 1..3. CUP(3,1) places cursor at row 2. IL(10) clamps to available lines (rows 2..3): both become blank, row 1 remains B, rows 0 and 4 unchanged.
